--- In gladiator@y..., "Deathifier" <storey@t...> wrote:
> If the converter messes something up let me know and I'll try to 
find out
> the cause.
> 
> The process is straightforward so in theory it shouldn't ever mess 
up a
> legitimate file :)

The tricky part is understanding the format enough to edit it.  Once I 
deleted a line I shouldn't have and couldn't save the file with the 
built-in scenario editor.  Another time I copied and pasted into a 
file and ended up with the same line repeated twice.  The built-in 
scenario editor didn't like that either.
